skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff for 2 turns on the ally with the lowest current HP.
skills.name: Da Magic Stick
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places a 30% [Increase SPD] buff on all allies for 2 turns, then heals all allies by 15% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
skills.name: Charge Cant
skills.books:
Lvl. 2  Heal +10%
Lvl. 3  Heal +10%
Lvl. 4 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.desc: Revives all dead allies with 30% HP. Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of this Champion’s MAX HP.
skills.name: Rise And Fight

skills.desc: Decreases the damage received by allies with 50% HP or less by 10%.
skills.name: Aid the Feeble [P]
